definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is a place for the toughest people and equines.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個最困難的人民和馬科舉行。

sentences.english: And a smaller faction of it, led by ArthurMutambara, has now endorsed Mr Makoni.
sentences.chinese: 穆塔姆巴拉領導的小派別已經決定支持馬科尼先生了。

sentences.english: A female horse or the female of other equine species.
sentences.chinese: 雌馬或其它馬科動物中的雌性。

sentences.english: In fact, the capital of Mali, Bamako, means "place of the crocodiles" in the Bambara language.
sentences.chinese: 首都巴馬科在班巴拉語中意指鱷魚之地。

sentences.english: The picture shows the Bamako Convention Building.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲馬裏巴馬科會議大廈。

sentences.english: Even in Bamako, the capital city, Mali is thoroughly under-developed.
sentences.chinese: 其實在首都巴馬科，馬裏依然顯得欠發達。

sentences.english: To reach the Castillo de San Marcos you must drive through part of the city of Saint Augustine.
sentences.chinese: 要去聖馬科斯堡，你必須驅車經過聖奧古斯丁市。

sentences.english: The Castillo de San Marcos grew very slowly. It took twenty-three years to complete.
sentences.chinese: 修建聖馬科斯堡進展很慢，它用了23年時間才完成。

sentences.english: A city of central Mali near the Niger River northeast of Bamako.
sentences.chinese: 馬裏中部一城市，靠近尼日樂河，位於巴馬科東北部。

sentences.english: A busy street in the middle of Bamako, Mali.
sentences.chinese: 圖中是馬面共跟國巴馬科市中心的一條繁閒的街講。

sentences.english: Castillo de San Marcos soon became Fort Saint Mark.
sentences.chinese: 聖馬科斯堡很快就變成了聖馬克堡壘。

sentences.english: “My project topic is stress relief, ” DeMarco explains.
sentences.chinese: “我的設計的主題是緩解壓力，”德馬科說。
